original_text:
and poverty will come on you like a thief
    and scarcity like an armed man.
korean_text: 네 빈궁이 강도 같이 오며 네 곤핍이 군사 같이 이르리라

sentences.original_text: and poverty will come on you like a thief
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가난은 도적처럼 너에게 닥쳐올 것이며

sentences.original_text: and scarcity like an armed man.
